title: Fight Club (1999)
description: An insomniac office worker forms an underground fight club with a charismatic soap salesman, leading to chaos.

title: The Dark Knight (2008)
description: Batman faces his greatest challenge as the Joker unleashes chaos and anarchy upon Gotham.

title: Wild Tales (2014)
description: Six darkly comedic stories of revenge and madness expose the explosive side of human nature.

title: Edge of Tomorrow (2014)
description: A soldier trapped in a time loop fights alien invaders, improving with each repeated battle.

title: Princess & PopStar (2012)
description: A princess and a pop star swap lives and discover the true meaning of friendship.

title: Intouchables (2012)
description: An unlikely friendship between a quadriplegic millionaire and his carefree caregiver changes both their lives.
